Scripts.OnClick: PlaySound("igChatScrollDown"); ToggleDropDownMenu(1, nil, getglobal(this:GetParent():GetName().."DropDownFrame"), this:GetName(), 0, 0)
PlaySound("igChatScrollDown"); ToggleDropDownMenu(1, nil, getglobal(this:GetParent():GetName().."DropDownFrame"), this:GetName(), 0, 0)
PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOn"); WIM_Options_General_Click();
PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOn"); WIM_Options_Windows_Click();
PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOn"); WIM_Options_Filter_Click();
PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOn"); WIM_Options_History_Click();
WIM_Options_WindowAnchorToggle_Click();
this:GetParent():Hide();
WIM_Help:Show();
PlaySound("igMainMenuClose"); WIM_Options_AliasWindow:Hide();
WIM_Options_AliasWindow_Click();
PlaySound("igMainMenuClose"); WIM_Options_FilterWindow:Hide();
WIM_Options_FilterWindow_Click();
